concept.deftn: An identifier, usually numeric, assigned to a specific fiscal award.

bestPractices.practice: This field is required if a funder's name is provided.
To add an additional grant number, click on "ADD a grant".
To delete a grant number, click on the red X.
Indicate the name of funders, by completing the Funder's Name field.
Do not preface the grant number with a number sign, "Number," "No." or any other generic prefix.
Enter the number, using digits, Roman numerals, and/or letters as appropriate.
You may preface the grant number with specific prefixes that indicate the source or type of the grant (e.g. NSF-DUE 0716055 NASA NAS597160).
